= Soar 7 Agents =
This is a collection of all the demo agents that were distributed with Soar 7.  It includes
  * Blocks World
  * Eight puzzle
  * Farmer
  * Kab
  * Missionaries and Cannibals
  * Safe Stack
  * Tower of Hanoi
  * Waterjug
